Description:
Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses using curl.exe

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious File Download From IP Via Curl.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\curl.exe' and original_file_name = 'curl.exe') and command re '://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' and command like '%http%' and (command like '% -o%' or command like '%--remote-name%' or command like '%--output%') and (command like '%.bat' or command like '%.bat"' or command like '%.dat' or command like '%.dat"' or command like '%.dll' or command like '%.dll"' or command like '%.exe' or command like '%.exe"' or command like '%.gif' or command like '%.gif"' or command like '%.hta' or command like '%.hta"' or command like '%.jpeg' or command like '%.jpeg"' or command like '%.log' or command like '%.log"' or command like '%.msi' or command like '%.msi"' or command like '%.png' or command like '%.png"' or command like '%.ps1' or command like '%.ps1"' or command like '%.psm1' or command like '%.psm1"' or command like '%.vbe' or command like '%.vbe"' or command like '%.vbs' or command like '%.vbs"' or command like '%.bat'' or command like '%.dat'' or command like '%.dll'' or command like '%.exe'' or command like '%.gif'' or command like '%.hta'' or command like '%.jpeg'' or command like '%.log'' or command like '%.msi'' or command like '%.png'' or command like '%.ps1'' or command like '%.psm1'' or command like '%.vbe'' or command like '%.vbs''))
